title.rendered: Royale Concorde International School, Chamrajpet, CBSE

content.rendered:
Admission Open For 2024 - 2025 Academic Year @ Chamrajpet

About Royale Concorde International School, Chamrajpet, CBSE

Discover Royale Concorde International School (RCIS), a distinguished CBSE institution ranking among the top 10 schools in South Bangalore. With a network of campuses spanning both Bangalore and Mysore, we are delighted to announce the grand opening of our 8th branch in the vibrant locale of Chamrajpet.

Royale Concorde International School prides itself on its exceptional infrastructure, ensuring a conducive learning environment. Our commitment to safety is unwavering, as evidenced by our round-the-clock security monitoring system and reliable transportation services.

As an English medium co-educational day-school, Royale Concorde International School operates under the auspices of the esteemed Royale Concorde Educational Trust. We offer a comprehensive curriculum following the CBSE syllabus, coupled with innovative and student-centric teaching methodologies. Our affiliation with CBSE extends up to the secondary level, ensuring a seamless educational journey.

At Royale Concorde International School, our vision is clear: to emerge as a preeminent global educational institution nurturing the future leaders and visionaries of our nation and the world beyond. Join us in shaping a brighter tomorrow.

Principal’s Message

Dr. Paramita Mishra

Principal

Swami Vivekananda said, “We want that education, by which character is formed, strength of mind is increased, intellect is expanded and by which one can stand on one’s own feet.” 

Education must build up the character and manifest the real nature to build up a personality which influences others and is impressive. The youth of today need to be transformed into responsible adults empowered with leadership, confidence, skill and values. They require grooming and training to be self-reliant, bold and confident enough to tide over the challenges thrown by life at every step. While embracing integrity and adopting values in action they need to endorse humanity besides being adept in skills to fend for themselves at the professional level. With changing times, education requires to be modified to prepare 21st century adults accredited with skills to enable them overcome the hurdles, embrace failures and march undauntedly to achieve their goals.  

 

At Royal Concorde, we envision unfolding the potentials existing in the child and unfurl their hidden talents to metamorphose them into proficient responsible adults professionally sound in their areas of interest. Every child here is special and unique and we believe in imparting holistic education to bring out the best in each one of them. Whether academics or sports, music or dance or arts, our students get exposure to every segment. Holistic education for all to prepare skilled passionate professional leaders for tomorrow is our motto, and we strive to excellence in fulfilling it. 

Here’s to a new beginning of a better tomorrow!!!

Best Wishes 

About the Principal

Dr. Paramita Mishra is a passionate educationist and an enterprising leader in the arena of education offering 25 plus years of experience, inspiring students in pursuing holistic academic and personal excellence. A doctorate in Zoology with specialisation in Environmental Sciences, besides B.Ed., she’s also authored a book “The Power of Conscious Leadership”. An IIM Alumni having completed a course in Education and Leadership Management from IIM Kolkata, she is also a soft skill trainer.

Vice Principal’s Message

Ms. Deepa Rohit

Vice Principal

 “A child must know that he is a miracle, that since the beginning of the world there hasn’t been, and until the end of the world there will not be, another child like him.” ~ Pablo Casals

It is my firm belief that in order for a child to reach his or her full creative potential, it is necessary to uncover the inner beauty and energy that is inside that child. Children who are able to develop a strong sense of self-esteem and confidence will be really emancipated to construct a world that is harmonious. They are going to be innovators, thinkers, and pioneers in their field. Through the integration of technology and tradition in a harmonious confluence of self, community, and nation, they will be empowered and happy individuals who respect and cherish difference. They will also reach out with compassion, creativity, and courage to usher in peace and progress.

Here at RCIS, we remain dedicated to accomplishing three overarching objectives. To begin, it is important to supply skills for professional development. The second step is to teach life skills, which include aspects such as maturity, emotional development, and soft skills. For the third step, cultivate a robust character in order to become a good citizen and human being. We want every student at RCIS to be a rising star who is fully prepared to touch the limitless sky and radiate light everywhere, demonstrating that he is a victor in life.

It is with great pride that we acknowledge the establishment of a positive working environment for the staff, as well as the development of each and every teacher’s ability to facilitate the holistic and integral growth of the pupils. We, as a group, are committed to working together to accomplish our goal of establishing the most conducive learning environment possible. In addition, we are firm believers in the concept of collaboration between students, parents, teachers, and support staff in order to establish an environment that fosters and maintains greatness.

In order to help our students achieve academic achievement and to motivate them to be lifelong learners, critical thinkers, and productive citizens of this ever-changing global society, we vow to be an innovative school that places a lot of emphasis on cultivating a positive atmosphere toward our students.

About the Vice Principal

Ms. Deepa Rohit a goal-oriented, hardworking, compassionate person. A talented, well- organized, strong classroom performer with a proven track record of achieving excellent pupil attainment. She has working experience of 22 years in education.  She comes with the belief ‘Education is the most powerful weapon which could be used to change the world through humanistic approach’, and she strives to ensure that students are treated fairly and that they are given every opportunity possible.  She aims to help students grow in being compassionate, respectful and responsible.

She is also a strong school leader with a positive attitude, along with the ability to listen, learn, communicate, and inspire others to make a difference in the lives of children.

Curriculum

Pre-Primary Level PlaySchool, Nursery & KinderGarten

  • Pre-Primary: Cognitive skills, neatness, and language fluency.
  • Activities: field trips, arts, and crafts enhance creativity and motor skills.
  • Building self-confidence and social skills with Rhyme Time and Show & Tell

Primary Level Class 1 to IV

  • Fluency in spoken and written English through interactive teaching.
  • Mathematics: Develop number concepts, elementary geometry, and mental math skills.
  • Environmental Science: Learn science through hands-on activities, observation, and discovery.
  • Introduction to computers: Theory and practical experience for connected learning.
  • Holistic education: Embrace values, arts, crafts, and sports activities for well-rounded learning.

Middle and Secondary Level Class V to X

Class V to VIII

  • Accelerated academics, promoting questioning, hypothesizing, analysis, and creativity.
  • Follow CBSE's three-language policy, offering Hindi, Kannada & Sanskrit/French as 3rd languages.
  • Emphasis on teamwork through group discussions, projects, activities, and experimentation.
  • Hands-on learning of Math and Science concepts in dedicated labs.

Class IX to X

  • CBSE's integrated two-year curriculum for holistic assessment.
  • Focus on life skills, values, sports, and co-curricular activities.
  • Subjects include English, Hindi/Kannada, Math, General Science, Social Science.
  • Option for Artificial Intelligence as the 6th subject.
  • Two variants of Mathematics available for Grade X board exams.

Senior Secondary Level Class X

  • Senior Secondary: Two-year study program in Science, Commerce, and Humanities.
  • Science stream divided into Engineering and Medical branches. # Optional subjects for Engineering and Medical students.
  • Commerce stream offers optional subjects including Applied Mathematics and Legal Studies.
  • Humanities stream offers Legal Studies and Home Science.
  • Experienced faculty prepares students for professional learning.
  • Achieving excellence in Board exams, competitive exams, and professional placements.

Admission

Unlock Your Child’s Bright Future at Royale Concorde International School Chamrajpet  CBSE School – Apply Now!

Click Here

Facilities

Our school offers a well-designed, aesthetically pleasing campus with well-ventilated classrooms with excellent amenities such as Medicare service, 24-hour security, sports clubs, a library, a play area, and state of art computer laboratories. Highly experienced faculties to deliver to competition. As a result, Royale Concorde International School has earned the reputation of being among the top schools in Bangalore. We’ve also earned a slew of international awards. Students in our school enjoy discovering new interests and making lifelong friends within a kind and caring community. They leave us with a distinctive sense of character, self-confidence, and resourcefulness, with the knowledge and skills necessary to become a leader in the world.

Contact Us

Bangalore – 560018
